Original PR Title: #39814 Fix "Execute" actions disabled when SQL editor is not focused
Generated PR Title: Refactor: Simplify SQLEditor Property Tester and Remove Focus Check
Generated PR Summary: This PR refactors the `SQLEditorPropertyTester` by removing direct dependencies on `TextViewer` and `StyledText` classes. It simplifies the property testing logic, notably by removing the `textWidget.isFocusControl()` check for the "statement" property, making the property evaluation independent of UI focus. The change also updates the receiver type check to `SQLEditorBase` for broader compatibility.
